description: Try our easy to follow Shortbread Trees recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Shortbread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Shortbread Trees Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat butter, sugar and vanilla together in a bowl until very pale and creamy. Add flour and stir until a soft dough forms. Turn onto a lightly floured surface and gently knead until smooth.
Halve dough and shape each portion into a disc. Wrap in plastic. Chill for 20 minutes or until firm.

Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Roll 1 portion of dough between 2 sheets of baking paper until 4mm thick. Using a tree-shaped biscuit cutter, cut biscuits from dough. Transfer to trays. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until light golden. Transfer to a wire rack to cool. Dust with icing sugar to serve.
